ai-patthana21.28:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.28:0.3_0: wrapped in a limited object with respect to the formless objects.
ai-patthana21.28:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.28:2.1_0: or without it, there is no cause or condition for the sake of heaven. This is a cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.28:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.28:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
